Docs.summary: The exception that is thrown when a XAML serialization attempt is made on a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> and <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> are used for lambda expressions specified in code and are not XAML serializable. If an attempt is made to serialize a workflow that contains a <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601>, a LambdaSerializationException is thrown. If the containing workflow requires XAML serialization, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicValue%601> or <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities.VisualBasicReference%601>, or use <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.ExpressionServices> to convert the <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaValue%601> or <xref:System.Activities.Expressions.LambdaReference%601> to a serializable format.
